name: The thin voice.
motif: To make himself unrecognizable by the victim, a predator or ogre modifies his throat or tongue mechanically (oils or burns it, asks blacksmith to remake it, etc.).
[paste it here]: l108b. The thin voice. To make himself unrecognizable by the victim, a predator or ogre modifies his throat or tongue mechanically (oils or burns it, asks blacksmith to remake it, etc.).
Mythemes:
•	Predator/ogre modifies throat/tongue.
	•	Predator becomes unrecognizable.
